de.hu.gralog.jgraph.cellview
Interface DisplayModeRenderer

All Superinterfaces:
org.jgraph.graph.CellViewRenderer
All Known Subinterfaces:
VertexDisplayModeRenderer
All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultEdgeRenderer, DefaultVertexRenderer, EllipseVertexRenderer
public interface DisplayModeRenderer
extends org.jgraph.graph.CellViewRenderer

This interface extends the basic JGraphRenderer in order to allow displaymodedependent display of CellViews. The feature is needed to highlight special components of a JGraph.

Author:
Sebastian
